participant_1.background:
I am not an avid exerciser, but I do enjoy walking on the beach with my family.
My dog is well fed and happy.
i have never met my father.
sometimes i listen to gary human to be ironic.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.

participant_2.background:
I'm from a small town in the Midwest.
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.
I wear comfortable clothes that make me feel confident.
through them i ve learned to make up myself and others.
I spend a lot of my free time researching and buying teapots.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Doing well! How about yourself?
Great! I am grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.
I am happy to hear that! I am also very grateful for my health.
What do you do for work?
I am a makeup artist and I love it!
That sounds like a really fun job! Do you get to dress up a lot?
Yes I do! I love to wear comfortable clothes that make me feel confident.
That's great! I love to wear comfortable clothes too.
I'm from a small town in the Midwest. Do you live in a big city?
I live on a farm in the Midwest!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to live on a farm.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine! I love animals, so I think I would love living on a farm.
I have a dog and he's my best friend. Do you have any pets?
I used to have a dog, but he died a few years ago. I still get sad when I think about him.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I lost my father when I was young and I still think about him all the time.
Thank you. I'm glad to know that someone understands how I feel.
I'm always here to talk if you need someone to listen.
Thank you. I appreciate that
